title: World ranking of professional golf players 2020
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Golfer, and Average points in each Golfer on the y axis.
Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) has the highest Average points and Hideki Matsuyama (JPN) has the lowest Average points.
The highest Golfer Rory McIlroy (NIR) has 5.17 more Average points than the lowest Golfer Hideki Matsuyama (JPN).
